title: From Confounding to Learning: Dynamic Service Fee Pricing on Third-Party Platforms
summary: We study the pricing behavior of third-party platforms facing strategic agents. Assuming the platform is a revenue maximizer, it observes market features that generally affect demand. Since only the equilibrium price and quantity are observable, this presents a general demand learning problem under confounding.
